problem_text_cn: 如图,已知等腰△ABC的一腰AB长为4厘米,过底边BC上任意一点D作两腰的平行线,分别交两腰于E、F,则四边形AEDF的周长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the length of one waist AB of the isosceles △ABC is N_0 centimetres. Cross any point D on the bottom edge BC to draw two waist parallel lines, and they intersect the two waists at E and F respectively, then the perimeter of the quadrilateral AEDF is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵DE∥AC,DF∥AB,∴∠EDB=∠C,∠FDC=∠B,∵AB=AC,∴∠B=∠C,∴∠EDB=∠B,∠FDC=∠C,∴DE=BE,DF=FC,∴四边形AEDF的周长是AE+ED+DF+AF=AE+BE+CF+AF=AB+AC=2AB=2×4=8厘米．故选:B．
